title: Introducing: biLLLy
body:
EDIT: Scratch this, BiLLLy plays in Hawkon’s live band, the two are separate artists.

A rather bizarre artist to choose for an introducing article in truth, given that it appears he’s perhaps already moved onto a new project, yet biLLLy’s three debut tracks, released last year, are too good not to mention. BiLLLy (aka Billy Paul Brooks) also plays live with [Hawkon](https://soundcloud.com/hawkonfire/sets/dare-to-follow-ep-1), a project that gained a decent level of blog exposure in the second half of 2014, yet if I’m completely honest, **_Finally Out There EP_**, his only biLLLy EP, excites me more than anything by **Hawkon**. Like a more vocal dd elle, it’s upbeat, laidback and just downright enjoyable; none of the vanity that has a tendency to creep into some of these more ‘serious’ projects. So it feels very Jai Paul influenced, but hey, there’s worse influences to have. Check out all three tracks below.
